CustomField.description: The answer/label shown to the user on a choice picklist in the FSL Mobile app for a specific Spot question (e.g. Yes, No, Third-party damage, Leak, No fault found)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter the label for the answer that should be shown to the user as a picklist choice (e.g. Yes, No, Third Party Damage. Leak etc.)
CustomField.label: Answer Label
